name: UpSkill Digital
slogan: UpSkill Digital is a training agency empowering people to thrive in the digital age
description: We are training and empowering thousands of SMEs, entrepreneurs, and young people up and down the country to use digital to grow their businesses.

jobs.title: Junior Learning Experience Designer
jobs.description:
WHO ARE WE?

UpSkill Digital is a diverse and dynamic digital education and transformation agency, running awesome projects all around the world for some pretty epic clients such as Google, Lloyds Banking Group and Adidas, training people in digital skills.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We're looking for a Junior Learning Experience Designer to work within our Learning Design team, creating engaging, fun and accessible learning experiences for a variety of stakeholders.

It's essential that we find someone who:
- Loves creating learning experiences within an agile, commercial environment 
- Has experience balancing multiple priorities from a variety of internal and external stakeholders
- Is highly competent using Google Slides, Google Docs and Google Sheets, or is willing to translate knowledge of other platforms 
- Has exceptional content writing skills and incredible attention to detail
- Is driven to handle a high volume workload and has strong problem solving skills
- Is an excellent communicator with native level of written and spoken English
 
It would be great, but not essential, if:
- You have a minimum of one year's previous experience as a Learning Designer
- You have advanced level of Adobe and any other design programmes required to create tailored and effective learning courses

WHAT'S THE JOB EXACTLY?

- Main duties will include:
- Creating courses and helping further develop our learning design templates
- Leveraging a commercial approach to developing course packages in a variety of formats from in-person to virtual and online content delivery methods
- Conducting needs assessments (in close coordination with stakeholders from sales, marketing, account managers, etc.) to ensure accurate, effective training content
- Supporting the Talent team with engaging and briefing our network of learning facilitators and trainers and freelance learning designers; ensuring the delivery of learning materials meets UpSkill standards globally
- Supporting with the recruitment, quality management and development of our coach talent pool
- Helping to ensure all learning products and programmes have measurable outcomes (e.g NPS) for UpSkill, the community and the learners; supporting on gaining feedback for evaluating effectiveness of learning solutions
- Continuously organising UpSkill’s learning content within our Google drive filing system
 
SOUNDS INTERESTING!

Great, we can't wait to hear from you!
To apply, please submit a CV and cover letter. We will be in touch with candidates we'd like to interview within 7 days.
Benefits:
Work from home opportunities
Company events & social hours
Casual dress
Wellness programs
Reference ID: JLD2020-02
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Salary: £27,000.00 to £35,000.00 /year

jobs.title: Freelance Digital Skills Coach - USA
jobs.description:
Who are UpSkill Digital?

UpSkill Digital deliver engaging, innovative and inspiring on-brand training solutions both digitally and face-to-face for and on behalf of many of the world’s largest brands. Our clients include Google, Apple, Lloyds Banking Group and Beats to name just a few. We’re bringing an exciting new programme to San Francisco, San Diego, New York, Nashville and Chicago with one of our top clients and are looking for some world-class digital training experts to join our team!

Sounds interesting, what’s the role?

We're working with one of our biggest clients to bring an inspiring and transformational digital skills programme to, specifically aimed at engaging hard-to-reach groups. Can you excite and educate audiences about digital tools and technologies? Are you passionate about improving lives and driving productivity through digital skills? Are you excited about putting people at the heart of the digital revolution and making sure no one gets left behind? If the answer is ‘yes’, then we’d love to hear from you.

And what is it that you’re really looking for?

We’re committed to working with the best in the business.
We're looking for best-in-class digital experts and advocates. Charismatic and self-motivated, you’ll be a natural at educating people whilst making them feel like there is nothing you can't help them with.
You’ll be confident with digital tools and experienced in the digital or tech industry. Most importantly, you’ll be a passionate freelancer who has the flexibility to work on different campaigns, both immediately and in the future.
You will assist in training and mentoring the public with digital skills development and coaching for one of our biggest brands with potential to move across to other projects too.
We’re on the lookout for freelance Digital Skills Coaches who are based in or around San Francisco, San Diego, New York, Nashville and Chicago.


Must-haves

Proven digital expertise
A flair for educating and engaging audiences
Live in the USA ( San Francisco, San Diego, New York, Nashville and Chicago )
Have good availability for flexible work across the next 3 months


What you’ll get if you work for us

Best in class training sessions, run both remotely and face to face
Unparalleled support from our head office team
Engaging work with an exciting roster of clients
The opportunity to meet and work alongside like-minded individuals
Make a real difference to the world of education and transform people’s lives with digital skills
Extremely competitive rates of pay with quick payment terms


Sounds great, how do I get involved?

If you've made it this far and are as excited as we are about digital skills training, then hit apply now via the link; https://upskilldigital.shortlist.co/job-openings/11/.

Next steps; If we think you've got what it takes we'll ask you to send us a video of you training us in something digital then we'll schedule a remote interview. If successful you will be invited to a training workshop in the new year.

Job Type: Contract

Job Type: Contract

jobs.title: Freelance Digital Skills Facilitator
jobs.description:
Are you a tech-savvy individual who loves interacting with people?

Are you passionate about empowering adults through education and digital skills. If the answer is yes, then we want to hear from you. We're on the lookout for freelance Training Facilitators to deliver exciting, inspiring and engaging digital education programmes across the UK.

We need a team of charismatic training facilitators to deliver digital skills development and coaching to the general public for an 8 week project.

We're looking for not just the best-in-class digital experts and advocates who eat, sleep and breathe digital marketing but also people who want to being theses skills to others.

You'll be confident with digital tools, experienced i the digital or tech industry, and be a natural at teaching people new skills.

Please get in touch if you have:

Minimum 2-3 years experience presenting or facilitating workshops
Deep customer empathy, patience and a proactive approach
A background in digital marketing and technology OR demonstrable experience in HR or career coaching.
Fluent in spoken and written English
Independent, driven self-starter looking for their next big challenge
Based in or commutable distance from Liverpool

Sounds great, how do I get involved?
If you've made it this far then we'd love to hear from you. Please complete the form via the link below and upload your CV with a 3-minute video teaching us something digital!

https://upskilldigital.shortlist.co/job-openings/12/

Our talent team will be in touch with further details.
